announcements.message: Chasen stop is only available M-F 7am-5:30pm. [View RPI Shuttle Info](https://administration.rpi.edu/parking-transportation/rensselaer-shuttle)

This is an older, stable, production version of Shubble that needed to deploy due to the newer version having a lot of slowdowns/server issues. Please visit/ask the Shuttle Tracker [discord](https://discord.com/invite/crpCNZkUwE) if there are any questions/issues with this version.
